info.title: KartrocketAPI
info.description: All the api's you need are listed here.

parameters.name: level
parameters.description: Up to which level you want the API to traverse in category tree

get.description: Get all products in specific category

200.description: Json formatted products in specified category

parameters.name: date_to
parameters.description: to which date in unix dateTime format

parameters.name: data
parameters.description: data of product in json format

success.example: Success: You have added Product 1 to your shopping cart!
